5.verse: People will proclaim the glorious splendor of your majesty,and I will meditate on your wonderful works.

6.verse: They will speak of the power of your awesome deeds,and I will relate your greatness.

7.verse: They will celebrate your abundant goodnessand sing joyfully of your saving justice.

8.verse: The Lord is gracious and merciful,slow to anger and abounding in kindness.

9.verse: The Lord is good to all,showing compassion to every creature.

10.verse: All your creatures praise you, O Lord,and all your saints bless you.

11.verse: They relate the glory of your kingdomand tell of all your power.

12.verse: They make known to all people your mighty deedsand the glorious majesty of your kingdom.

13.verse: Your kingdom will last forever,and your dominion will endure throughout all generations.The Lord is faithful in all his promisesand kind in all his deeds.

14.verse: The Lord supports all those who are fallingand raises up all who are bowed down.

15.verse: The eyes of all look hopefully to you,and you give them their food at the right time.

16.verse: You open your handand satisfy the needs of every living creature.

17.verse: The Lord is righteous in all his waysand merciful in everything he does.

18.verse: The Lord is near to all who call out to him,to all who call out to him sincerely.

19.verse: He satisfies the desires of all who fear him;he hears their cry and saves them.

20.verse: The Lord watches over all who love him,but he will completely destroy all the wicked.

21.verse: May my mouth declare the praise of the Lord,and may every creature bless his holy nameforever and ever.

1.verse: The Concluding Hallel—Pss 146–150 -Psalm 146 -Trust in God, Creator and Redeemer -Alleluia.Praise the Lord, O my soul.

2.verse: I will praise the Lord as long as I live;I will sing praise to my God throughout my life.

3.verse: Do not place your trust in princes,in mortal men who have no power to save.

4.verse: When the spirit departs, they return to the earth;on that very day all their plans come to naught.

5.verse: Blessed is he whose help is the God of Jacob,whose hope is in the Lord, his God,

6.verse: the Maker of heaven and earth,the sea, and everything in them—the one who keeps faith forever.

7.verse: He grants justice to the oppressedand gives bread to the hungry.The Lord releases prisoners

8.verse: and opens the eyes of those who cannot see.The Lord lifts up those who are bowed down;the Lord loves the righteous.

9.verse: The Lord watches over the strangerand sustains the fatherless and the widow,but he blocks the way of the wicked.

10.verse: The Lord will reign forever,your God, O Zion, for all generations.Alleluia.

1.verse: Psalm 147 -Hymn to the City of God -Alleluia.How good it is to sing praises to our God;how pleasant it is to give him fitting praise.

2.verse: The Lord restores Jerusalemand gathers together the dispersed people of Israel.

3.verse: He heals the brokenheartedand bandages their wounds.

4.verse: He fixes the number of the starsand assigns a name to each.

5.verse: Great is our Lord and awesome in power;his wisdom is without limit.

6.verse: The Lord sustains the poorbut humbles the wicked in the dust.

7.verse: Offer songs of thanksgiving to the Lord;play the lyre in honor of our God.

8.verse: He veils the heavens with clouds,supplies the earth with rain,and makes the hills sprout with grass.

9.verse: He provides food for the animalsand for the young ravens when they call.

10.verse: He takes no pleasure in the strength of the horse,or delight in the fleetness of a runner.

11.verse: The Lord takes pleasure in those who fear him,those who place their hope in his kindness.

12.verse: Praise the Lord, O Jerusalem!Glorify your God, O Zion!

13.verse: For he strengthens the bars of your gatesand blesses your children within you.

14.verse: He brings peace to your bordersand fills you with the finest of wheat.

15.verse: He sends a command to the earth;his word runs with utmost speed.

16.verse: He gives the snow like wooland scatters the frost like ashes.

17.verse: He hurls down his hail like crumbs;who can withstand his cold?

18.verse: He sends his word, and the ice melts;he stirs up his breezes, and the waters flow.

19.verse: He has revealed his word to Jacob,his decrees and his judgments to Israel.

20.verse: He has not done this for the other nations;they are not aware of his judgments.Alleluia.

1.verse: Psalm 148 -Song of the Universe -Alleluia.Praise the Lord from the heavens;offer praise to him in the heights!

2.verse: Praise him, all his angels;offer praise to him, all his hosts!

3.verse: Praise him, sun and moon;offer praise to him, all you shining stars!

4.verse: Praise him, you highest heavens,and you waters above the heavens.

5.verse: Let them praise the name of the Lord,for it was at his command that they were created.

6.verse: He established them in place forever and ever;he issued a law that will never pass away.

7.verse: Praise the Lord from the earth,you sea monsters and ocean depths,

8.verse: fire and hail, snow and clouds,storm winds that carry out his word,

9.verse: all mountains and hills,all fruit trees and cedars,

10.verse: wild animals and all cattle,creeping creatures and flying birds,

11.verse: kings of the earth and all nations,princes and all rulers on the earth,

12.verse: young men and women,the elderly, as well as children.

13.verse: Let them all praise the name of the Lord,for his name alone is exalted;his majesty is above the earth and the heavens.

14.verse: He has raised high a horn for his people,to the glory of all his saints,for the people of Israel who are close to him.Alleluia.

1.verse: Psalm 149 -Glorification of God, Lord and Creator -Alleluia.Sing to the Lord a new song,his praise in the assembly of the saints.

2.verse: Let Israel rejoice in its Maker;let the children of Zion rejoice in their King.

3.verse: Let them praise his name with dancingand make music to him with tambourine and lyre.

4.verse: For the Lord takes delight in his people,and he crowns the humble with salvation.

5.verse: Let the saints exult in their gloryand sing for joy on their beds.

6.verse: May the praises of God be on their lipsand a double-edged sword in their hands

7.verse: to wreak vengeance on the nationsand punishment on the peoples,

8.verse: to shackle their kings with chainsand their nobles with iron fetters,

9.verse: to execute the judgments decreed against them:such is the glory for all his saints.Alleluia.

1.verse: Psalm 150 -Harmonious Praise of God -Alleluia.Praise God in his sanctuary;praise him in the firmament of his power.

2.verse: Praise him for his awesome acts,praise him for his immeasurable greatness.

3.verse: Praise him with the sound of the trumpet,praise him with the harp and lyre.

4.verse: Praise him with tambourines and dancing,praise him with strings and flutes.

5.verse: Praise him with clanging cymbals,praise him with crashing cymbals.

6.verse: Let everything that breathesoffer praise to the Lord.Alleluia.
